metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2079 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
X File Explorer (aka xfe) might allow local users to bypass intended accessrestrictions and gain access to arbitrary files by leveraging failure touse directory masks when creating files on Samba and NFS shares.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2079` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xfe - 1.37-2
xfe-i18n - 1.37-2
xfe-themes - 1.37-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xfe package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.37-2').
